attributes.action: Make the family courts question weather they really have the childs best interest in mind, when they make decisions regarding the child
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many children are left really upset when a mother has to comply with a court order and drop them off at their fathers for contact.  Why why why do the courts not listen more to the child, The courts are supposed to make decissions that are in the best interests of the child but they really fail to do this.
